short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily unsubscribe from YouTube channels with checkboxes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Easy Unsubscribe
   
   A simple and efficient way to manage your YouTube unsubscriptions. Features include:
   - Batch selection of channels for unsubscribing
   - Visual progress tracking
   - Save channels for later unsubscribing
   - Clean and intuitive interface
   
   How to use:
   1. Click "Toggle Selection Mode" to show checkboxes
   2. Select channels you want to unsubscribe from
   3. Click "Unsubscribe Selected" to process
